titles.title: A bill to provide that the exception from the hospital insurance tax for service performed by an election official or election worker shall apply where renumeration for such service is less than $500 in a calendar year.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to increase from $100 to $500 the payment that may be made in a calendar year to an election official or election worker for services before liability for the hospital insurance tax is incurred.
